system.descriptor: Using and Understanding of short-hand codes to express concepts via hand signs, markings, etc for particular group. Test not required for leaving or reading basic messages, might be required for complicated meanings or obscured/damaged ciphers.
system.uses: Test to decipher complicated meaning or read obscured cipher of particular skill group. Skill Groups: Rogue Trader, Mercenary Cant, Nobilite Encoding, Astropath, Underworld.

description.value: Using and Understanding of short-hand codes to express concepts via hand signs, markings, etc for particular group. Test not required for leaving or reading basic messages, might be required for complicated meanings or obscured/damaged ciphers.
